name: gotosocial
description: GoToSocial is a self-hosted, federated social network server compatible with Mastodon and ActivityPub. It focuses on lightweight deployment and better moderation tools for smaller communities and individuals.
features: Federated Network: Connect with Mastodon, Pleroma, and other ActivityPub-compatible social networks.
Lightweight Server: Minimal resource requirements designed for single-user or small community instances.
Mastodon Compatible: Use existing Mastodon mobile apps and clients with GoToSocial backend.
Enhanced Moderation: Advanced moderation tools for managing content and user interactions.
Privacy Controls: Granular privacy settings for posts, followers, and account visibility.
Media Support: Share images, videos, and audio with customizable upload limits.
Custom Emojis: Add and use custom emoji reactions and expressions.
API Access: Full ActivityPub and Mastodon-compatible API for client applications.
